name: NSDockTile
desc: The visual representation of your app’s miniaturized windows and app icon as they appear in the Dock.

items.name: var contentView: NSView?
items.desc: The view to use for drawing the dock tile contents.

items.name: var owner: AnyObject?
items.desc: The object represented by the dock tile.

items.name: var showsApplicationBadge: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean showing whether the tile is badged with the application’s icon

items.name: var badgeLabel: String?
items.desc: The string to be displayed in the tile’s badging area.
